\chapter{\textcolor{Chapter }{What can it do?}}\label{Introduction}
\logpage{[ 1, 0, 0 ]}
\hyperdef{L}{X782C13F782D16E8D}{}
{
 The SimplicialSurface-package contains this basic functionality: 
\begin{enumerate}
\item Working with simplicial surfaces (and generalisations of that), for example:
TODO 
\item Working with edge colourings of simplicial surfaces (for the purposes of an
embedding)
\item Treatment of folding and unfolding for these objects. TODO
\end{enumerate}
 We want to show an image of a triangle: After the image we put another one.  This ends our minimal example. }
